Package com.inrupt.client.jena

Class JenaBodyPublishers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrupt.client.jena.JenaBodyPublishers
  • public final class JenaBodyPublishers
extends Object
    Request.BodyPublisher implementations for use with Jena types.
